<title level="2" right="Creature 7">[The Disciples](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2173)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=160" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Crown of the Kobold King](/Sources.aspx?ID=148) pg. 89</row>

**Perception** +15; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [lifesense](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=21) 30 feet

**Languages**
[Dwarven](/Languages.aspx?ID=3); (can't speak any language)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +17, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +14

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +6

**Dex** +3

**Con** +4

**Int** -2

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +2
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 22 

**Fort** +17 

**Ref** +14 

**Will** +15 

</row>

**HP** 130
([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42))

**Immunities**
[death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

**Rise Again** ([necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120)) If the Disciples are reduced to 0 Hit Points by means other than fire or positive damage, they return to unlife at the start of their next turn. They have 45 Hit Points and are [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31) in the space in which they were destroyed. The Disciples can't be returned by this ability again for 1 hour, and if destroyed before this time passes, they remain truly dead.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +17 ([deadly d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)),
**Damage** 2d8+9 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +17 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)),
**Damage** 2d6+9

**Agonized Howl** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16), [Enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120)) The Disciples howl in pain at their cursed existence. Creatures within a 30-foot emanation take 6d8 mental damage (DC 25 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Will save). The Disciples can't use Agonized Howl again for 1d4 rounds.

**Awful Approach** <actions string="Single Action" />  The Disciples reshape their grotesque form to move swiftly. They Stride twice. Any living creature that can see the Disciples during this movement must succeed at a DC 22 Fortitude save or be [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34) (sickened 2 on a critical failure). This is a [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106) and [visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163) effect. The Disciples can't use Awful Approach again for 1d4 rounds.

</column>
name: The Disciples
